add_contact_groups.description: Add the contact to a group
add_contact_groups.name: Add to Group

add_contact_urn.description: Add a URN for the contact
add_contact_urn.name: Add URN

remove_contact_groups.description: Remove the contact from a group
remove_contact_groups.name: Remove from Group

say_msg.placeholder: Send a message to the contact

send_broadcast.name: Send Broadcast
send_broadcast.placeholder: Send a message to the contact

send_msg.name: Send Message
send_msg.placeholder: Send a message to the contact

set_run_result.description: Save a result for this flow
set_run_result.name: Save Flow Result

split_by_run_result.description: Split by a result in the flow
split_by_run_result.name: Split by Flow Result

start_session.description: Start somebody else in a flow
start_session.name: Start Somebody Else

wait_for_response.description: Wait for the contact to respond
wait_for_response.name: Wait for Response

asset_selector.placeholder: Select existing [[name]] or enter a new one
asset_selector.placeholder_plural: Select existing [[name]] or enter a new one

drag_helper: To connect nodes, <1>drag</1> from the red circle.
empty_flow_message: <0>Let's get started</0><1>We recommend starting your flow by sending a message. This message will be sent to anybody right after they join the flow. This is your chance to send a single message or ask them a question.</1>
enter_to_create_group: Enter a name to create a new group
enter_to_create_label: Enter the name of an existing label or create a new one

errors.group_not_found: Enter the name of an existing group
errors.http_header_missing_name: HTTP headers must have a name

add_groups.summary: Select the groups to add the contact to.

add_labels.summary: Select the labels to apply to the incoming message.

add_urn.summary: Add a new URN to reach the contact such as a phone number.

call_webhook.body_summary: Modify the body of the [[method]] request that will be sent to your webhook.
call_webhook.example: This response would add <1>@webhook.product</1> and <4>@webhook["stock level"]</4> for use in the flow.
call_webhook.header_summary: Add any additional headers below that you would like to send along with your request.
call_webhook.help: If your server responds with JSON, each property will be added to the Flow.

parameters.summary: <0>[[flow]]</0> expects the following parameters to be set by this flow. These can be set using a <4>Save Flow Result</4> action or directly below.

play_audio.help_text: Enter a variable that contains a recording the contact has previously recorded. For example, @results.voicemail or @fields.short_bio.

remove_groups.placeholder: Enter the name of an existing group
remove_groups.remove_from_all_summary: Remove the active contact from all groups they're a member of.
remove_groups.summary: Select the groups to remove the contact from.

forms.result_name_help: By naming the result, you can reference it later using [[resultFormat]]

facebook.topic_placeholder: Select a topic to use over Facebook

send_msg.add_quick_reply: Add a new Quick Reply and press enter.
send_msg.all_destinations: Send a message to all destinations known for this contact. If you aren't sure what this means, leave it unchecked.

facebook.warning: Sending bulk messages over a Facebook channel requires that a topic be specified if the user has not sent a message in the last 24 hours. Setting a topic to use over Facebook is especially important for the first message in your flow.

send_msg.localized_quick_replies: Add a new [[language]] Quick Reply and press enter.
send_msg.quick_replies: Quick Replies are made into buttons for supported channels. For example, when asking a question, you might add a Quick Reply for "Yes" and one for "No".
send_msg.summary: Add an attachment to each message. The attachment can be a file you upload or a dynamic URL using expressions and variables from your Flow.
send_msg.summary_plural: Add an attachment to each message. The attachment can be a file you upload or a dynamic URL using expressions and variables from your Flow.
send_msg.whatsapp_warning: Sending messages over a WhatsApp channel requires that a template be used if you have not received a message from a contact in the last 24 hours. Setting a template to use over WhatsApp is especially important for the first message in your flow.

split.localize_rules: Sometimes languages need special rules to route things properly. If a translation is not provided, the original rule will be used.

split_by_group.label: Select the groups you'd like to split by below

forms.type_label: When a contact arrives at this point in your flow...

operators.has_number_gte: has a number at or above
operators.has_number_lte: has a number at or below
